title: RYZE and FAKER
body:
I was watching Worlds last night and in game 4 faker did well on ryze and the casters said something. In effect, "only faker can play ryze like that." 

Not true. Ryze is easy mode, but only if youve had a few games with him.

Notice how faker throws q at air? He's stacking both his tear and his passive. Not sure about faker but i prefer being at 3 passive stacks when going in for a fight because:

(3 stacks) q (4 stacks) r (5 stacks) w q e q w q e q w q e q Etc.

Guys, it's broken as all hell. Go out and exploit it. He is weak against cc, but 1v1, you cant move. It is true snare lock without gaps until youre dead.

From your friendly LOL-God,

Nononotorious.

So ashamed that i have to play on this server. Anyone get the feeling we're rockbottom?

replies.body:
As a person who has played on OCE, NA and EUW/EUNE 

Our med/high Bronze and Silver are of a much lower quality of player then the other regions, at B5 and Gold-Diamond we are almost identically bad/good respectively. When it comes to master tier the other regions step up again... with the best of the best players on OCE being among the worst (of course they are fantastic players, I am comparing them to the Challenger NA, KR and EU standard)



Back to {{champion:13}} , he is not easymode, you have fallen into the easy to play hard to master trap.  If he really was easymode, just play him to challenger? Why doesn't every pro team have Ryze as a contested pick? Fakers Ryze is legendary, simple and clean cut

he didnt want to push the lane? also his opponent wouldve kept his distance anyway. im sure these days the only thing pros cant account for is a catching-off-guard 3/4 stacks into flash combo

and yes we are rockbottom, 40% of ranked players are in bronze, the lowest percentage in the world, dont let anyone tell you otherwise. even if we may have a few more asians than some other fairly low ranked regions like turkey and russia we're still the most laidback region on the planet, including game mechanics
